upgrade.sql: delete from pojobtrigger where JOB_UID in (select JOB_UID from pojob where jobclass like '%generatemenucache%')
delete from pofile where JOB_UID in (select JOB_UID from pojob where jobclass like '%generatemenucache%')
delete from pofile where JOB_UID in (select JOB_UID from pojob where JOB_Parent_UID in (select JOB_UID from pojob where jobclass like '%generatemenucache%'))
delete from pojob where JOB_Parent_UID in (select JOB_UID from pojob where jobclass like '%generatemenucache%')
delete from pojob where jobclass like '%generateMenucache%'
delete from pojobtrigger where JOB_UID in (select JOB_UID from pojob where jobclass like '%testJob%')
delete from pofile where JOB_UID in (select JOB_UID from pojob where jobclass like '%testJob%')
delete from pofile where JOB_UID in (select JOB_UID from pojob where JOB_Parent_UID in (select JOB_UID from pojob where jobclass like '%testJob%'))

delete from pojob where jobclass like '%testJob%'
